amendatorysection.catchline: Department; collect quality assurance assessment; remit to State Treasurer.
amendatorysection.para: The department shall collect the quality assurance assessment and remit the assessment to the State Treasurer for credit to the Nursing Facility Quality Assurance Fund. No proceeds from the quality assurance assessment, including the federal match, shall be placed in the General Fund unless otherwise provided in the Nursing Facility Quality Assurance Assessment Act.
